name: Polar Identity
description:
Short game for Polar Bear jam.

It's about polar bear struggling in climate change and how nature will adapt to changes, but losing something very valuable, the polar identity.

All the assets are made by me

Gameplay

Polar bear tries to survive forward in life.  Hunt for seals, fishes and rabbits to regain energy.

Controls

A,D - keys for moving left or right (event the backwards movement is restricted) Space - Jump
CTRL - to run
ESC - to pause
